value.title: DAX Fridays! #79: KEEPFILTERS
value.excerpt: In today's video we are going through the DAX function KEEPFILTERS. KEEPFILTERS will remove the behaviour that CALCULATE has where it removes the filters available. value.title: DAX Fridays! #81: CALCULATETABLE
